actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that economically disadvantaged individuals who have attained age 65 are eligible for the Targeted Jobs Tax Credit, and to provide for a permanent extension of the Credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include employment of certain economically disadvantaged elderly individuals who have attained age 65 as eligible for the targeted jobs tax credit. Makes such tax credit permanent.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that economically disadvantaged individuals who have attained age 65 are eligible for the Targeted Jobs Tax Credit, and to provide for a permanent extension of the Credit.
